page.title: 02BOWNESS-ON-SOLWAY.SERVICES 1
page.content: Bowness has a sub-Post Office, open on weekday mornings. There are 2 postal collections daily, and Girobank facilities. Telephone box is near Post Office. There are 7 return buses daily except Sundays and Bank holidays.First bus leaves Bowness at 06.25.Last bus leaves Carlisle at 21.15(weekdays)and 22.15(Saturdays).No other forms of public transport. Library van visits Bowness on Fridays at 3-weekly intervals,-next visit 27.9.1985. All year it is possible to see people "walking the Wall", yet, despite its Roman history, there are virtually no remains/monuments to see. On "The King's Arms" wall, a plan with text describes the Roman fort.
